Articles.Content:
Hello good KSP community, I'd like to request a vehicle. I cannot seem to make a good and effective Kethane/Fuel tank hauler. Can someone please make and share the craft file with me?

Requirements:

Supports Kethane mod.

No Omni-Wheels.

No B9( No matter what I do, i cannot get it to work, even with texture reduction )

Decent Stability.

You can use Novapunch, KW Rocketry, Interstellar.

If someone can do this I would be grateful! Thank you!
Do you just need it to transport Kethane in space or to and from somewhere?

All of my designs ended up exploding after breaking their wheels off with the weight of the Kethane, as it was being pumped in :|

I gave up with large tankers and just reverted to small ones that could mine kethane as fast as converted fuel was pumped out - much more stable and less prone to part lag or weight issues. They relied on the Quantum resource transfer mod though, and that was discontinued ages ago in 0.18 or something.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50559-Serial-Multiplayer-Space-Program-0-22-Kethane-KAS

There are some Kathane miner, transportation craft in there.
